mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscription (user_id, trainer_id, category, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{trainerId}, 0, CURDATE(), ADDDATE(CURDATE(), INTERVAL #{subscribeMonth} MONTH));
mapper.update: UPDATE subscription SET valid = CASE WHEN NOW() > end_date THEN 0 ELSE valid END WHERE user_id = #{id} AND valid = 1;
mapper.select: SELECT id, name FROM user WHERE id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM subscription WHERE trainer_id = #{trainerId} AND valid = 1 )
